summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TheSyncBridge commenting system. All backend APIs (22/22 tests passed) and frontend functionality working perfectly. Guardian login, comment posting, threaded replies, admin comment management, and security features all verified and working correctly.
passed_tests: Guardian login at /login with Scroll ID verification (SB-0001, SB-0002 tested)
Logged-in guardian can see their Scroll ID in navigation bar
Logged-in guardian can post comments on transmissions
Logged-in guardian can reply to comments (threaded replies working)
Guardian can delete their own comments via delete button
Admin can view all comments in Comments tab (6 comments visible)
Admin can delete any comment via trash icon buttons
Admin can post comments as ADMIN via admin interface
Non-logged-in users see login prompt when trying to comment
Product management (add/delete) still works in admin dashboard
All backend comment APIs working: create, get, reply, delete own, admin delete, admin create
Comment threading and parent-child relationships working correctly
Admin dashboard has 4 tabs: Transmissions (1), Products (1), Orders (4), Comments (6)
Navigation between all pages works seamlessly
Mission clock displays Day 0/325 correctly
Guardian registration and lookup still working (SB-0012 created during testing)
All existing features (transmissions, merchandise, orders) remain functional
Security: Non-authenticated users cannot post comments
UI shows proper login prompts and navigation to /login page
Comment timestamps and scroll ID attribution working correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (22/22 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all commenting features tested successfully)
